entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
